CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc East Rovers?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc East Rovers is arc {New Chiefs}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc New Chiefs?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc New Chiefs is arc {East Rovers}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Poolechester Dynasty} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from New Chiefs to Poolechester Dynasty in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from East Rovers to Poolechester Dynasty in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and New Chiefs in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and New Chiefs is {358}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and South Stars in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Poolechester Dynasty and South Stars is {489}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from New Chiefs?
SC.A: The total flow output from New Chiefs is {579}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Poolechester Dynasty?
SC.A: The total flow input by Poolechester Dynasty is {1074}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 406? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {517} from {South Stars} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {489} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {South Stars}, a flow of {423} from {South Stars} to {East Rovers}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 210? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {199} from {East Rovers} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {145} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {East Rovers}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 246 and 374? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {358} from {New Chiefs} to {Poolechester Dynasty}, a flow of {308} from {Poolechester Dynasty} to {New Chiefs}, a flow of {271} from {South Stars} to {New Chiefs}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from South Stars to New Chiefs or from South Stars to East Rovers?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {East Rovers} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from East Rovers to Poolechester Dynasty, from South Stars to East Rovers, or from South Stars to New Chiefs?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {East Rovers} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {South Stars}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Poolechester Dynasty} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc South Stars, Arc Poolechester Dynasty, Arc New Chiefs, Arc East Rovers}.
